headers.subject: Re: encryption on network

body.para: You're best option here is to install Wireshark (wireshark.org), transfer a plain text file while capturing network packets and see what happens!
On Thu, 28 Jul 2011, Dominic Dougherty wrote:

quote.quotepara:
Samba is used by one of our customers. AIX servers and Windows xp server
connect to this samba share. This samba server is a AD member. Accesses to
shares are restricted via domain groups. So, this is my question.

Is the network traffic encrypted, if not, what are my options to encrypt network
traffic.
